titles.title: Blest Be The Tie That Binds

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Blest be the tie that binds Our hearts in Christian love; The fellowship of kindred minds Is like to that above.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Before our Father's throne We pour our ardent prayers; Our fears, our hopes, our aims are one Our comforts and our cares.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We share each other's woes, Our mutual burdens bear; And often for each other flows The sympathizing tear.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When we asunder part, It gives us inward pain; But we shall still be joined in heart, And hope to meet again.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: This glorious hope revives Our courage by the way; While each in expectation lives, And longs to see the day.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
From sorrow, toil and pain,
And sin, we shall be free,
And perfect love and friendship reign
Through all eternity.
